thread.title: Obama, Merkel: Best friends in Bavaria
thread.title_full: Obama, Merkel: Best friends in Bavaria

title: Obama, Merkel: Best friends in Bavaria
text: Obama, Merkel: Best friends in Bavaria Updated 1850 GMT (0150 HKT) June 8, 2015 Obama, Merkel: Best friends in Bavaria 8 photos U.S. President Barack Obama and German Chancellor Angela Merkel stroll outside at the summit of the Group of Seven nations at the Schloss Elmau resort on Sunday, June 7, near Garmisch-Partenkirchen, Germany. Hide Caption Obama, Merkel: Best friends in Bavaria 8 photos Obama and Merkel attend a concert on June 7. Hide Caption 2 of 8 Obama, Merkel: Best friends in Bavaria 8 photos Obama enjoys a beer with Merkel, right, at the summit of G7 nations on June 7 in Kruen, Germany. Hide Caption Obama, Merkel: Best friends in Bavaria 8 photos Obama and Merkel greet each other at a bilateral meeting on June 7. Hide Caption 4 of 8 Obama, Merkel: Best friends in Bavaria 8 photos Merkel and Obama chat while posing for a group photo on Monday, June 8, the second day of the summit of G7 nations. Hide Caption 5 of 8 Obama, Merkel: Best friends in Bavaria 8 photos From left: European Council President Donald Tusk, Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe, Canadian Prime Minister Stephen Harper, Obama, Merkel, French President Francois Hollande, British Prime Minister David Cameron, Italian Prime Minister Matteo Renzi and European Union Commission President Jean-Claude Juncker pose for a photo at Elmau Castle near Garmisch-Partenkirchen, southern Germany, on June 7. Hide Caption 6 of 8 Obama, Merkel: Best friends in Bavaria 8 photos Obama and Merkel walk on their way to their first working session at Elmau Castle on June 7. Hide Caption 7 of 8 Obama, Merkel: Best friends in Bavaria 8 photos On the bench, from left: Liberian President Ellen Johnson Sirleaf, Merkel, Obama and Renzi sit on a bench outside Elmau Castle on June 8. Hide Caption 8 of 8 U.S. President Barack Obama and German Chancellor Angela Merkel spent some quality time together drinking German beer and wandering the fields of Bavaria at the G7 Summit in southern Germany.
